channel.title: go on 笔记本
channel.description: Recent content in go on 笔记本

item.description: 安装 卸载docker sudo yum remove docker docker-client docker-client-latest docker-common docker-latest docker-latest-logrotate docker-logrotate docker-engine 安装docker环境依赖 yum install -y yum-utils device-mapper-persistent-data lvm2 配置国内docker-ce的yum源(阿里云) yum-config-manager –add-repo http://mirrors.aliyun.com/docker-ce/linux/centos/docker-ce.repo 会下载 /etc/yum.repos.d/docker-ce.repo 文件 安装docker yum install aocker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io -y docker-ce-cli docker命令行工具包 containerd.io 容器接口相关包 启动并设置开机启动 systemctl start docker && systemctl enable docker curl -fsSL get.docker.com -o get-docker.sh
